table.description: Contains a row for each Isotope label in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each replicate loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each sample file loaded in a targeted MS run.

column.description: User-specified value
Extracted from raw data file, when available

table.description: Contains a row per Skyline document loaded in this folder.
Contains a row for each peptide group loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for protein within a grouping in a targeted MS run.
Parent table to Peptide, Molecule, GeneralMoleculeChromInfo, GeneralAnnotation.
Contains a row for each peptide loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each non-proteomic molecule loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each peptide chromatogram loaded in a targeted MS run.

column.description: Retention Time
(area of precursor in the sample) / (total area of all precursors for the same grouping in the sample)

table.description: Parent table to Precursor, MoleculePrecursor, PrecursorChromInfo, PrecursorAnnotation

column.description: Collision Energy
Declustering Potential

table.description: Contains a row for each non-proteomic molecule precursor loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each precursor loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each sample file-scoped chromatogram, such as pressure traces or TIC.
Contains a row for each precursor chromatogram loaded in a targeted MS run.

column.description: Best Retention Time
(sum area of precursors for this peptide in the same sample) / (total area of all precursors for the same grouping in the sample)

table.description: Parent table to Transition, MoleculeTransition, TransitionChromInfo, TransitionAnnotation. Base table for both proteomic and small molecule transitions.

column.description: Collision Energy
Declustring Potential

table.description: Contains a row for each transition loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each non-proteomic molecule transition loaded in a targeted MS run.
Contains a row for each transition chromatogram loaded in a targeted MS run.

column.description: Retention Time
This attribute is used only for isotope modifications
This attribute is used only for isotope modifications
A short description of what happened
The date and time at which the event happened
Optionally, the date and time at which the event stopped
The category of the event

table.description: Contains a row for each replicate exclusion, for all or a specific QC metric.

column.description: The QC metric for this replicate exclusion. Note that a NULL value in this field indicates that the replicate should be excluded for all QC metrics.
The start date and time for the runs to include in the training set for this guide set.
The end date and time for the runs to include in the training set for this guide set.

table.description: Captures the last time that AutoQC pinged the QC folder
